message.body: (1/2) I think my company has been ripping me off and I never noticed. I pulled last years tax return and my gross was only like 26k. Thats like 13 an hour but I
(2/2) made 17 an hour........ thats around an 8k difference.
How didnt I ever notice that??
Thats the equivalent to around 12-13 weeks of pay missing. NO WAY I missed that many days
What!!! you need to talk to HR about that.
That's so much money!
Do you have a second to quickly talk? I have a phone interview at 10 and want to test my reception
Im sorry I cant. Im at work and im prettttty sure im getting laid off today
Good luck though! Im sure its great
Ohhh no. Okay call me later.
How did it go??
Ehh it was ok. Not the best. I was really nervous. Did you get laid off?
No I didn't I'm a spaz case
Haha. I'm Glad you didn't.
We are getting hand drawn noodles in Chinatown tonigjt
I am so jealous. I wish we could come up for the weekend
Me too!!! It's freaking cold tho. The house is freezing
Like a refrigerator
Yeah it was brutal today. It snowed at you iliana school yesterday
Yeah here too!!! Snowed on my way home from my writing class!
Dang. Im so not ready
Me neither. I need some gloves
